attributes.additional_details: What the NHS do and have done since Covid started is immense and critically important. Payrise needed NOW. They are exhausted.
attributes.background: Provide a good payrise for NHS staff

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
